form.fullname.desc: Enter your name as it appears on your passport

confirmation.title: Confirmation Title
sample.title: sample.title
form.send_notifications: Would you like to receive notifications?
chart.title: Chart example
participant-consent-form.title: Participant consent form
participant-consent-form.intro: Enter information about your research project.
contactInfo.title: Your contact information
backgroundInfo.title: Background information
backgroundInfo.desc: Will you be conducting research with another department?
form.authority: Which piece of legislation gives you the authority to collect personal information?
form.authority.desc: For CDS, put The Financial Administration Act
form.research_method: What type of research are you doing?
form.research_goal: What's the goal of your research?
form.research_goal.desc: e.g. create an online tool that will make it easier for Veterans to determine which VAC services are relevant to them
form.session_activity: What will you be asking the participant to do during the sessions?
form.session_activity.desc: e.g. complete tasks with our prototype software and ask you to describe your thoughts and impressions of it
form.session_duration: How long will the session take?
form.session_duration.desc: e.g. 1 hour. Be as precise as you can
form.personal_information_collected: What personal information will you be collecting during the research activity?
form.personal_information_collected.desc: Seperate them out with a comma, e.g. age, employment history and experience with government services
form.compensation: Will you be paying the participant for their time?
form.confidentiality: How will you protect the participant's privacy?
form.administrative_decision: Will the participant's responses affect their access to government benefits or services?
form.consent: How will you get proof of consent?
form.is_business: Will the participant be sharing information about their company's operations or confidential information?
form.recording_type: How will you be recording the participant?
landing-page.title: Generate privacy and consent forms for research sessions
landing-page.intro: This service will generate customized forms and privacy statements for you based on the type of design research you're doing.
landing-page.option2: form for recruiting through a third party
agreement-1.title: agreement-1.title
questions-1.title: Participant consent form
questions-1.intro: Enter information about your research project.
testInfo.title: Test Information
form.is_with_partner: Are you conducting this research with a partner department?
form.partner_department_name: What is the name of the department you are working with?
form.partner_department_acronym: What is the acronym of the department you are working with?
form.partner_department_authority: What is the partner's collection authority?
form.partner_department_authority.desc: Don't know? Ask your policy advisor.
form.compensation_method: How will you be compensating the participant?
form.compensation_value: How much will you be compensating the participant?
form.administrative_purpose: How will this information directly impact the user's access to government of Canada services or benefits?
form.administrative_purpose.desc: E.g., this information will be used to reschedule your citizenship ceremony.
form.purposes_for_which_the_recording_ma: What are the purposes for which the recording can be disclosed?
form.personal_information_disclosed_to_p: What personal information will be disclosed to the public?
form.anonymized: By anonymizing the responses so they can't be linked to the participant
form.anonymous: By not collecting the identity of the participant
form.confidential: By referring to participants using a number or pseudonym – no one outside of CDS will know who the participant is (most common)
form.not_confidential: Through only sharing the responses and identity of the participant internally and with our partner organization
form.public: No privacy – the participant's identity, responses and information will be shared publicly
errors.recording_type: You can't choose video recording if you're not collecting the participant's identity, or if you're anonymizing responses.
errors.consent: You must get consent in writing if you're paying the participant.
questions-2.title: questions-2.title
translations-1.title: Translations
translations-1.intro: The following questions should be completed if you wish to generate a french form. If not, leave them blank.
